sourcesContent:
import React,{useState, useEffect} from 'react' import {Form, Button, Table} from 'react-bootstrap' import {useDispatch, useSelector} from 'react-redux' import {createBill, fetchBill} from '../../redux/actions/bill/billAction' function AddBill() { const [productKey, setProductKey] = useState(" ") const [quantity, setQuantity] = useState(0) const dispatch = useDispatch(); useEffect(() => { dispatch(fetchBill()) }, [dispatch]) const billList = useSelector(state => state.bill) const {billItems} = billList; console.log(billItems) const bill = billList.billItems && billList.billItems.bill console.log(bill) const formSubmitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); dispatch(createBill(productKey, quantity)) setProductKey(" ") setQuantity(0) } return (
Product Key setProductKey(e.target.value)} /> Quantity setQuantity(e.target.value)} />
) } export default AddBill
